picked_headlines.summary: Optimizing HDC-CNN models on RISC-V GPUs with custom instructions for performance gains.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This article bridges the gap between product engineering and AI research, showcasing practical applications of AI in hardware optimization.

picked_headlines.summary: Tool-Neuron enables offline AI on Android, ensuring privacy without cloud reliance.
picked_headlines.reason_for_choice: This piece highlights a significant advancement in privacy-focused AI deployment, appealing to both technical audiences and stakeholders concerned with data security.

digest:
- *Cognitive Edge Computing* explores optimizing LLMs for edge deployment, crucial for IoT applications. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2501.03265)
- *High-Performance GPU Resources* are vital for LLMs in radiology, improving diagnostic accuracy. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.16328)
- *IterResearch* introduces a novel approach to long-horizon reasoning in AI, enhancing dynamic task efficiency. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.07327)
- *ProRefine* optimizes AI workflows by refining prompts with textual feedback, boosting model performance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.05305)
- *OpsAgent* enhances cloud incident management with a self-evolving multi-agent system. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2510.24145)
- *EditGRPO* uses reinforcement learning for accurate chest X-ray report generation, improving clinical outcomes. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2509.22812)
- *ReCode* updates LLMs' code generation with reinforcement learning, adapting to API changes. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2506.20495)
- *LegalEval-Q* benchmarks LLMs in legal text quality, providing insights into model performance. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2505.24826)
- *Isaac Lab* offers a GPU-accelerated simulation framework for scalable robot training. [Read more](https://arxiv.org/abs/2511.04831)
- *Privacy-First AI on Android* with Tool-Neuron enables offline model use, ensuring data privacy. [Read more](https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45885091)
